definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]

surname Wei/name of vassal state of Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States/Wei state, founded by Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1], one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty/the Wei dynasty 221-265/Wei prefecture and Wei county at different historical periods

sentences.english: AimTo observe the inhibitory effect of germanium ferulic acid on the tumor U_(14 ).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察阿魏酸鍺對小鼠子宮頸癌14號的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare the sodium ferulate single-layer osmotic pump controlled release tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備阿魏酸鈉單層滲透泵控釋片。

sentences.english: The content of ferulic acid was determined by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 以HPLC法測定樣品阿魏酸含量。

sentences.english: Study on standard of Ferula fukanensis K.
sentences.chinese: 阜康阿魏種子質量分級標準初步研究。

sentences.english: Sodium hydroxide was used to release ferulic acid from wheat bran in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 該文研究以麥麩爲原料製備阿魏酸技術路線。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the absorption kinetics of ferulic acid at different intestine segments in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究阿魏酸在大鼠各腸各段的吸收動力學特徵。

sentences.english: Objective To appraises clinical application value of sodium ferulate for injection in treating chronic nephritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價阿魏酸鈉在慢性腎炎治療中的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a method for determining the content of ferulic acid in Qianggan syrup.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立強肝糖漿中阿魏酸含量的測定方法。

sentences.english: Ultrasonography and extracting a short time, Angelica in the basic ferulic acid can be extracted completely.
sentences.chinese: 且超聲提取時間短，當歸中的阿魏酸基本能提取完全。

sentences.english: Objective To study the compositions of resin and basilar leaves of Ferula lehmanni Boiss.
sentences.chinese: 目的對大果阿魏樹脂和基生葉成分進行研究。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the protective effects of sodium ferulate on experimental hepatic injury in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究阿魏酸鈉對大鼠實驗性肝損傷的保護作用。

sentences.english: Added antioxidants to the alkine hydrolysis system was able to reduce loss of ferulic acid caused by oxidation.
sentences.chinese: 鹼水解體系中添加抗氧化劑能減少阿魏酸的氧化破壞。

sentences.english: The synthesis of feruloylated monoacylglycerol catalyzed by P-Toluene sulfonic acid was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究對甲基苯磺酸催化合成阿魏酸單甘油酯的工藝。

sentences.english: Objective To make a rapid determination of ferulic acid and identification of its structure in rhizome of Phragmites communis (RPC).
sentences.chinese: 目的對蘆根中阿魏酸含量和結構進行快速測定和分析。

sentences.english: The taxonomic studies on Xinjiang Ferula and its close genera.
sentences.chinese: 新疆阿魏屬及其相近屬間的分類學研究。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To synthesize and identify the artificial antigen of ferulic acid(FA).
sentences.chinese: 目的合成阿魏酸全抗原並加以鑑別。

definition: Thai ginger/lesser galangale (Kaempferia galanga)/cyanide (loanword)/same as 氰化
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine
schizonepeta, herb used in Chinese medicine
Chinese cinnamon (Cinnamomum cassia)/also written 肉桂[rou4 gui4]
